item_23.title: RECEIPTS
item_23.description: This section outlines the process for acknowledging receipt of the Disclosure Document. It states that the last two pages are receipt pages that need to be signed and dated upon receipt of the Disclosure Document. The second receipt page should be detached and promptly returned as specified on that page.

key_information.point: Receipt pages are located on the last two pages of the Disclosure Document.
Franchisees must sign and date each receipt page as of the date they received the Disclosure Document.
The second receipt page should be detached and returned promptly as instructed.
